name: Digital Video Recorder, 8-Channel DVR, White
description: This sleek 8-channel Digital Video Recorder (DVR) from HiLook offers reliable surveillance recording capabilities in a compact, minimalist design. The pristine white housing features efficient ventilation slots and a clean, professional aesthetic that fits seamlessly into any security setup. Ideal for both home and business applications, this DVR provides essential video monitoring and storage functionality. The streamlined form factor allows for flexible placement while maintaining powerful recording capabilities across all eight channels. With its straightforward interface and durable construction, this DVR delivers dependable performance for your video security needs. The device's simple yet sophisticated design emphasises functionality without compromising on style, making it a practical choice for modern surveillance systems.

name: Surveillance DVR Recorder - 2MB - 8 Output - XVR301-08F - Supports up to 2 IP Cameras and 8 BNC - Supports HDD Storage up to 8TB - UNV UNV
description: Surveillance DVR Recorder - 2MB - 8 Output - XVR301-08F - Supports up to 2 IP Cameras and 8 BNC - Supports HDD Storage up to 8TB - UNV UNV

name: DVR (Four Output - 2 Mega - UNV)
description: The Uniview XVR301-04F is an advanced DVR designed to meet modern security needs. The device supports up to 4 channels video with resolution up to 1080p, ensuring clear and accurate recording. It features multiple inputs, providing great flexibility in choosing the right cameras. It has a single slot for a hard drive with a capacity of up to 6TB, which enables enough storage for long periods of videos. It also has an easy-to-navigate user interface, and remote access options via smartphone apps, allowing you to monitor your activity anytime, anywhere. With support for multiple network protocols, the XVR301-04F is an ideal choice for homes, offices and shops.

name: Hikvision 1080P Lite 4-ch eDVR with 512GB Embedded SSD Storage
description:
Hikvision 1080P Lite 4-ch eDVR with 512GB Embedded SSD Storage
1080P MP Lite 4-ch eDVR with 330G embedded SSD storage(2 week recording)
Hikvision eDVR supports H.265-based scene-adaptive bitrate coding applied on eDVRs to ensure sufficient storage and quality video compression.
The eSSD applied in Hikvision DVRs/NVRs/IPCs are integrated with Hikvision's data management technology.
eDVR with eSSD is featured with low power consumption, reducing the cost on daily electricity use, and contributes to energy saving.
Easy to setup & install: Palm-sized DVR makes it so much easier to install in real application. When in daily operation, the built-in E-UI enables intuitive and simple configuration.

name: HIKVISION 8 Channel eDVR [ Built-in SSD Storage ] Compatible with Upto 2MP CCTV Cameras DS-E08HGHI-B with USEWELL HDMI, White
description:
HIKVISION eDVR with Built-in STORAGE


Motion Detection 2.0
Human/Vehicle Analysis
Deep learning-based motion detection 2.0 is enabled by default for all analog channels, it can classify humans and vehicles, and extremely reduce false alarms caused by objects like leaves and lights;

Quick search by object or event type is supported;

Video Compression: H.265 Pro/H.265
Encoding Resolution: 1080p Lite/720p/720p Lite/WD1/4CIF/CIF/QVGA



Comes with USEWELL HDMI

name: Hikvision ds-7108hghi-k1(s) 8-ch dvr turbo hd dvr 2 megapixel 1080p lite @15 fps
description:
Introducing the Hikvision HD DVR 2MP, a cutting-edge surveillance solution that combines high-definition video recording with advanced audio capabilities. This DVR Turbo HD by Hikvision is designed to provide unparalleled performance, featuring audio transmission via coaxial cable and a range of innovative features for seamless connectivity and security. The H.265 Pro+/H.265 Pro/H.265 video compression further optimizes storage efficiency, making it an ideal choice for secure and efficient video storage.

Audio Via Coaxial Cable
Experience enhanced audio surveillance with the Hikvision HD DVR 2MP, offering audio input via coaxial cable. This innovative feature ensures not only visual clarity but also comprehensive audio monitoring, adding an extra layer of security to your surveillance system.

name: DAHUA COOPER XVR1B04 – DVR 4 Channels PentaHybrid 1080p Lite/ 720p/ H265+/ 1 Ch IP Additional 4+1/ 1 Port SATA Up to 6TB/ P2P/ Smart Audio HDCVI
description: The COOPER XVR1B04 DVR is a Penta-hybrid DVR that supports 5 different technologies: HDCVI /AHD/TVI/CVBS/IP, making it possible to upgrade a previous CCTV system or use it for a completely new CCTV system. This DVR has 4 HDCVI channels in which high definition video is transmitted via coaxial cable, in the case of this DVR at 1080N/720P.

name: DAHUA XVR1B16-I/DVR 16 Channel 1080p Lite/WizSense/Cooper-I/16 Channels+2IP or up to 18Ch IP/8 Channel SMD Plus/Smart Search/1 Sata Port up to 6TB
description: Dahua Technology, a world-leading video focused intelligent IoT services and solutions provider, introduced its new XVR series, Cooper Series with SMD Plus to benefit customers from the AI upgrade. The series is designed to reduce false alarm rates and human surveillance costs, bringing great value to customers looking for products with precise human/vehicle alarms to raise the safety level of various indoor and outdoor facilities.

name: Ds-7616NXI-K2/16P 16CH 4K 16 Channel PoE AcuSense NVR Network Video Recorder Human/Vehicle Detection Compatible with HIK Vision IP Camera(No HDD) - Black
description: Hikvision Us Local Service Professional and Reliability，H.265+ compression effectively reduces the storage space by up to 75%. Adopt stream over TLS encryption technology which provides more secure stream transmission service. Adopt Hik Acusense technology to minimize manual effort and security costs. Plug & Play Up to 16-ch IP camera inputs, plug & play with 16 power-overEthernet (PoE) interfaces. Up to 160 Mbps incoming bandwidth. Network & Ethernet Access, 16 independent PoE network interfaces, 1 self-adaptive 10/100/1000 Mbps Ethernet interface, Hik-Connect for easy network management. Smart Function All channels support Motion Detection 2.0. 1-ch facial recognition for video stream, or 4-ch facial recognition for face picture. Smart search for the selected area in the video, and smart playback to improve the playback efficiency. Human/Vehicle Analysis：16-ch. Face picture comparison, human face capture, face picture search. HD Video Output Provide independent HDMI and VGA outputs. HDMI video output at up to 4K resolution. H.265+/H.265/H.264+/H.264 video formats. Incoming Bandwidth 160 Mbps, Outgoing Bandwidth 160 Mbps. Storage and Playback Up to 2 SATA interfaces for HDD connection (up to 10 TB capacity per HDD). 16-ch synchronous playback. Capacity: Up to 10 TB capacity for each HDD(without HDD and PoE off). RICHSECU.

name: Amicool, USB 3.0 Type-C CD DVD+/-RW External Drive Optical C Drive Slim CD/DVD ROM Burner Rewriter Writer Portable for PC Laptop Desktop Macbook Mac Windows 7/8.1/10, Linux
description:
Features:
1. Unique intelligent recording technology, external DVD drive, new chip and powerful error correction function to play music and movies without delay or distortion.

2. With USB 3.0 and Type-c technology it features high-speed transfer speed and powerful error correction, anti shock and noise reduction.

3. Watch movies, listen to music, create backup CDs, install software, or burn CDs. Supports CD-R, CD-ROM, CD +/- RW, DVD-ROM, DVD-R, DVD+/-RW, DVD-R DL and VCD discs.

4. Extremely slim and portable, it is completely plug and play, easy to install and use.

Specifications:
* Supported formats: DVD-ROM, DVD Video, CD-R/RW, CD-ROM/XA, CD-ROM, CD-EXTRA, CD-TEXT

* Supported Media Type: CD-ROM, CD-R, CD-RW, DVD-ROM, DVD-R, DVD-RW, DVD+RW, DVD+R, DVD+R DL, DVD-R DL and DVD - RAM.

* Read speed: CD-ROM: 24x Max; DVD-ROM: up to 8x, DVD-ROM (DL): up to 6 times

* Write speed: 24 times CD-R, 8 times CD-RW, DVD±R: up to 8 times, DVD±R DL: up to 4 times, DVD-R ± 9: up to 2.4 times

* Rewrite speed: DVD + RW: up to 4x, DVD-RW: up to 4x, CD-RW: up to 10x DVD-RAM: up to 3x

* Memory Cache: 2m

* Power consumption: 3~5W

* Power: DC 5V
